item.title: Runescape 3
item.dc:creator: @Dell451 Dell451
item.description:
@Dell451 wrote:

No, No, You guys got it wrong…
RS3 is in development stage, they’re gonna realse it in 3-d V.R. in 2009 were you put on the helmet, stand on a treadmill, and the wear some gloves, but it will be online, and when you chop at trees or mine or even train theiving or agility, you actualy have to work like the Wii and you can “Feel” stuff, and you’ll be safe from Child Molesters becuase when you talk, you hear the other people , like SOCOM video game.

For your inventory, you reach behide you and grab you backpack, and you can’t store 2h’ers in you backpack, because you couldn’t in real life.

For mage, you would shout the spell names, and if your runes were correct, you could cast that.

Range would be you load as fast as you can reach and pull anouther arrow out (or anouther 2,3,4,5,or 6, depending on your level)
All this would only cost like $1000 , but if you think about it, all the game systems will cost way higher in 2009 (2006 -PS3-$600 in America, Wii- $250, X-box- $300), And all your RS2 or RSC iteams would be transfered to the game by a one time upload, meaning you would get one upload forever.

And if this doesn’t happen in 2 years, it probaly will in the next five to eight.

Read full topic

You do not have RS3 severs.

item.title: Runescape 3
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

offtopicish - I already have my own rs3 servers…
ontopic - if jagex keeps runescape2 for another year, the whole runescape community is going to crash…
eg:
-dragon armour will be like 90mill
-rune armour will be like 1k
-party hats will be like 2000m
-noobs will get full rune after one day of wcing
-there will be too many players
-the highscores wont be needed anymore (because everyone in the highscores will have 99 of a stat
and also:
-runescape2 is crop graphics
-all worlds will be full all the time
-way more lag
-more people quitting
-private servers will probley get better then real rs, now that 1000’s of people know how jagex edit’s their cache… (with a game making program)
so, in total:
-jagex will get a runescape3 or
-shut down or
-not accept new players to rs2/make max stat to 199
~!~Thank-you for listening to my speech on why jagex WILL make a runescape3~!~

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape 3
item.dc:creator: @apzrman apzrman
item.description:
@apzrman wrote:

[quote=“Whiteyboy5, post:103, topic:38460”][quote author=apzrman link=topic=54227.msg1056854#msg1056854 date=1175003003]

It will probably never Happen… why would they make a new one when most players are happy with the current one. And some of the new GFX is really decent, so theres not much need for another one

how about 1 where you can use frst person/3rd person view? and where you can actually see what’s in the distance?
[/quote]
I suppose first person would be pretty cool but i think the distance thing is just something to with the graphics capabilities in Java, You can’t add to much graphics or it would lag and take a while to reload everytime you move a map section.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape 3
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“apzrman, post:101, topic:38460”][quote author=Whiteyboy5 link=topic=54227.msg1054670#msg1054670 date=1174953282]
It will probably never Happen… why would they make a new one when most players are happy with the current one. And some of the new GFX is really decent, so theres not much need for another one
[/quote]
how about 1 where you can use frst person/3rd person view? and where you can actually see what’s in the distance?[/quote]
I suppose first person would be pretty cool but i think the distance thing is just something to with the graphics capabilities in Java, You can’t add to much graphics or it would lag and take a while to reload everytime you move a map section.

Read full topic
